author: taylor
msg: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-363
Document Resources: Profiler mapping criteria to associated pages
Added some sample mappings:
// TODO: configure this information externally and live
static String[][] REGEX_MAP =
{".*\\.html", "/Public/content.psml"},
{"/content/*", "/Public/content.psml"}
//        {"/data/*", "/Public/content2.psml"},
The rules are currently hard-coded, so Im leaving this issue open.
I can think of several ways to configure:
1. get the mappings from Spring assembly
this would require assembling all profiling criteria and rules
from a Spring assembly, a good idea anyway
2. a shortcut of #1, but put the mappings in the Profiler component assembly
3. put the mappings in the database, the best solution as its live configuration
